channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Honor Magic 7 Pro Review: Refined Flagship
item.description: Honor’s latest flagship phone is a refined marriage of hardware and AI-infused software.

item.title: Amazon suspends US drone deliveries following crash at testing facility
item.description: Amazon has paused testing of its delivery drones following a crash involving two of its models, according to Bloomberg. It’s the latest setback for Am...

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg Turns His Back on the Media
item.description: The Meta CEO is abandoning his commitment to the truth in favor of a Trump-style playbook.

item.title: Netradyne snags $90M at $1.35B valuation to expand smart dashcams for commercial fleets
item.description: Distracted driving is one of the leading causes of car accidents and a major reason why auto insurance premiums are expected to increase in 2025. For ...

item.title: ChatGPT’s head of product will testify in the US government’s case against Google
item.description: The U.S. government has picked Nick Turley, ChatGPT's head of product, to testify in its antitrust case against Google. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights ...

item.title: The FCC’s Jessica Rosenworcel Isn’t Leaving Without a Fight

item.title: EV startup Canoo files for bankruptcy and ceases operations
item.description: Seven-year-old electric vehicle startup Canoo has filed for bankruptcy and will “cease operations immediately.” The company is liquidating its assets ...

item.title: Perplexity acquires Read.cv, a social media platform for professionals
item.description: Read.cv, a social media platform for professionals that competed with LinkedIn, has been acquired by AI-powered search engine Perplexity. As part of t...

item.title: Waymo Finds a Way Around US Restrictions Targeting Chinese Cars
item.description: Waymo confirms to WIRED that its planned partnership with Chinese-owned automaker Zeekr remains “on track.”
